```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(RColorBrewer )
library(ComplexHeatmap)
BCRL=BCRL_chainlong
```

```{r}
BCRLVlist_values<-read.csv("TCRBCRchain200/IGKlistvalues.csv")
```

```{r}
BCRL$variable<-factor(BCRL$variable,level=BCRLVlist_values$x)
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)



split_BCRL<- strsplit(BCRL$Sample, "_")


BCRL$CellType <- sapply(split_BCRL, "[", 1)
BCRL$AdjusteID<- sapply(split_BCRL, "[", 2)

BCRL$Organ <- substr(BCRL$AdjusteID, 1, 1)
BCRL$Sample<-factor(BCRL$Sample,level=rev(sort(unique(BCRL$Sample))))
BCRL2 <- BCRL %>% group_by(variable) %>% filter(sum(as.numeric(value) )!= 0) %>%ungroup()
BCRL2$Week<-substring(BCRL2$AdjusteID,2,5) %>% as.numeric()
BCRL2$Stage<-ifelse(BCRL2$Week<=28,'Early','Late')


library(dplyr)

BCRL2 <- BCRL2 %>% 
  mutate(Organ = case_when(
    Organ == "B" ~ "PBMC",
    Organ == "L" ~ "Liver",
    Organ == "S" ~ "Spleen",
    Organ == "T" ~ "Thymus",
    TRUE ~ Organ  
  ))
BCRL2$Organ_Stage=paste0(BCRL2$Stage,'_',BCRL2$Organ)
```
```{r}
BCRL2$Organ_Stage<-factor(BCRL2$Organ_Stage,levels = c("Early_PBMC"  , "Late_PBMC",  "Early_Liver", "Early_Thymus" ,  "Early_Spleen" ))
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggsci)
# Subset the data
data_subset <- subset(BCRL2, CellType == "IGKC+Naïve B")
my_comparisons <- list(
  c("Early_PBMC", "Late_PBMC"),
  c("Early_PBMC", "Early_Liver"),
  c("Early_PBMC", "Early_Spleen"),
  c("Early_PBMC", "Early_Thymus"),
  c("Late_PBMC", "Early_Liver"),
  c("Late_PBMC", "Early_Spleen"),
  c("Late_PBMC", "Early_Thymus"),
  c("Early_Liver", "Early_Spleen"),
  c("Early_Liver", "Early_Thymus"),
  c("Early_Spleen", "Early_Thymus")
)
P2A=subset(BCRL2,CellType=="IGKC+Naïve B") %>% ggplot(aes(Organ_Stage,value,fill=Organ_Stage))+geom_boxplot(position = position_dodge(width = 1), outlier.size = 0.7, width = 0.1, show.legend = FALSE, color = "black")+ 
  theme_bw(base_size = 16) + 
stat_compare_means(comparisons = my_comparisons, label = "p.signif", tip.length = 0) +
 facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free", labeller = label_both) +  
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(), 
        panel.background = element_blank(), 
        panel.border = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(color = "black"),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12, angle = 45, hjust = 1), 
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        legend.title = element_blank(), 
        legend.key = element_blank()) +
  labs(x = '', y = '', title = 'BCRL_ratio in IGKC+Naïve B')+scale_fill_npg()
 P2A
 ggsave(plot = P2A,'Gao_TCRBCRchain_Figure/IGKCposNaïveBBCRL.pdf',width = 20,height = 40)
```

```{r}
# First, calculate mean and se for each group
data_summary <- BCRL2 %>%
  group_by(CellType, variable, Organ_Stage) %>%
  summarise(mean_value = mean(value), se = sd(value) / sqrt(n()), .groups = 'drop')

# Define dodge width
dodge <- position_dodge(width = 0.9)

# Then plot
P284 <- ggplot(data_summary, aes(x = variable, y = mean_value, fill = Organ_Stage)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = dodge) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean_value - se, ymax = mean_value + se), width = 0.6, position = dodge) +
  stat_compare_means(data = data_summary, comparisons = my_comparisons, label = "p.signif", tip.length = 0) +
  facet_grid(CellType ~ variable, scales = "free", space = 'free', switch = "y") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme_bw(base_size = 16) +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(), 
        panel.background = element_blank(), 
        panel.border = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(color = "black"),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 14, angle = 45, hjust = 1), 
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        strip.text.x =  element_blank()) + # Remove facet labels
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Composition (%)") +
  scale_fill_npg()

P284
```
